comments:
First background:
I have left my Eclipse running for a week now. 
I have been doing an enormous amount of work including refactoring, editing, 
compiling, debugging, running, JUnit stuff, etc.

Now the error:
I just was going to work on a bug submitted by another user having to do with 
tabs and I ran into this error. I was going to setup my tabs as the other user 
had his. 
1. I opened the preference dialog
2. Opened the Java tree
3. Clicked on Editor
4. Selected the behavior tab
5. Un-checked insert spaces for tabs
6. Clicked apply
7. Received a dialog box telling me that there was an, "Error notifying a 
preference change listener. Check log for details."

I checked the log for details and found this stack trace:

Please reopen with exact steps to reproduce if you still see the problem in
I20030128.
